pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualise and Calculate Life History Parameters for Fisheries Science using 'ggplot2' // Contains functions to create life history parameter plots from raw data. The plots are created using 'ggplot2', and calculations done using the 'tidyverse' collection of packages. The package contains references to FishBase (Froese R., Pauly D., 2023) https://www.fishbase.se/.
